content.data: This is a Drill and Dowel Machine Link.
Output for the Pillar Lockdowel machine.

When a Tool in the Tool Catalog is assigned to this machine you will 
 get two Parameters:

Drill  
	 (_hmInsert) - When set to Yes indicates the tool can be used to Drill. 
 Insert  
	 (_hmDrill) - When set to Yes indicated the tool can be used to Insert.

Drill  
	 (_hmInsert) - When set to Yes indicates the tool can be used to Drill.

Drill  
	 (_hmInsert) - When set to Yes indicates the tool can be used to Drill.

Insert  
	 (_hmDrill) - When set to Yes indicated the tool can be used to Insert.

Insert  
	 (_hmDrill) - When set to Yes indicated the tool can be used to Insert.
